WizardAnswered on 23 Jan 2019Ok, I am not very well versed in this so I only share what I know so far.Every industrial space has a specified used something like B1 and B2, light industrial or factory or heavy industrial.I believe you need to get the relevant authorities to approve your usage before you can rent or buy industrial property.0 comments0
